hopobject.name: Lox
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux i686; en-US; rv:1.9.2.12) Gecko/20101027 Ubuntu/10.10 (maverick) Firefox/3.6.12
hopobject.body: Lox is an expansion board for the BeagleBoard for Amateur "Ham" Radio internet linking. It controls 2 simplex nodes or 2 repeaters, completely replacing the PC normally used. Lox gives direct access to the on board audio hardware of the BeagleBoard.
hopobject.shortdesc: An expansion board for the BeagleBoard that gives direct access to the on board audio hardware, for use in Ham Radio internet linking.
